body: With multi-cursor impl, we only need `QueueStates` in shardInfo. `QueueAckLevel` can be removed.

comments.body:
Just realized that replication queue is still using QueueAckLevel, which has per (remote) cluster ack level.

So we either need to somehow represent it in QueueStates, or create a new field for replication.
Today replication also has a separate field for DLQ ack level (for each source cluster), so probably make sense to create a new field for replication that combine normal ack level and dlq ack level.

Other queues will also have DLQ in the future, but they won't have per cluster information.

title: Deprecate `QueueAckLevel` field in shardInfo
